column1: 0503|5:03 a.m.|It was 5:03 a.m. It didn't matter. She wasn't going to get back to sleep. She threw off her covers and
0503|5:03|I looked down at the watch Trey had given me last Christmas
column2: the delicate gold links so real and solid
column3: and it seemed like someone else’s memory strapped to someone else’s shaking hand. It was 5:03 now. I was halfway to my house.
